quest.name: Digging in the Dark
journal: Ademar is in the dark and needs an adventurer's aid.

Ademar has exhausted his supply of lantern oil, making it impossible for him to prospect at night. Procure an alternate light source for him by weakening bright balloons and then capturing them with his lamps.
You have successfully fashioned two balloon lamps. Deliver them to Ademar.
Ademar expresses his thanks, then promptly returns to his digging. The life of a prospector affords little time for idle banter.
objectives: Weaken and then capture bright balloons with lamps.

dialogue.name: ADEMAR
dialogue.text: Pray help me, friend. I've run clean out o' lantern fuel, and I'm afeared I won't make it through the nightlong past sundown.

dialogue.name: ADEMAR
dialogue.text: I've not tried it meself, but I've heard that ye can fashion makeshift lanterns by sealin' those flying balloons inside these here lamps. 'Course, it might take some coercin' before they goes in, if ye know what I mean.

dialogue.name: ADEMAR
dialogue.text: Were ye able to fashion some lamps for me, friend?

dialogue.name: ADEMAR
dialogue.text: Yer a godssend. Thanks to you, I can get back to me diggin'I'll be diggin' long past sundown tonight. Them's gold in thar hills, high-ho!â™ª
